title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 588.4 - Towing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 588.4 - Towing

State Regulations
(a) Any motor
vehicle operated or parked on the SUNY/HSCB campus in violation of these
regulations may be removed or towed away and stored at the owner's expense. Abandoned vehicles shall be disposed of in accordance with the Vehicle and

Traffic Law. (b) The owner of a
vehicle stored and/or towed pursuant to these regulations shall be charged the
fee charged by the private towing and storage service utilized by the
campus. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
588.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
